segments.text: Paul ? I need to work out a time to get together with your people .

segments.text: Does everybody need to be there ? Hilary and Jason are on vacation this week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It would be best if everybody could be there . How about next week sometime ?
segments.speaker: S1
